author: Anonymous Gear
title: Program Error
question:
What does the following error mean?

first: expects a non-empty list; given: (make-ball 302.5 267.5 4 -3)
student_answer:
I might be wrong but "first" operates on lists. (make-ball 302.5 267.5 4 -3) isn't a list, it's a ball.
(cons (make-ball 302.5 267.5 4 -3) empty) would be a list and using "first" on it would produce (make-ball 302.5 267.5 4 -3)
